dct_title_s: The Rand McNally map of the borough of Manhattan, the principal portions of the boroughs of Bronx, Brooklyn and Queens, and the business district of Jersey City
dct_description_sm: Inset: Greater New York, scale [approximately 1:230 000].; Verso: includes street indexes.; Shows: named streets, subways, railways, ferries, submarine tunnels, public buildings, parks, cemeteries, rivers, creeks, swamps.
